Title: 2 BHK Apartment for Sale in Vinzol Ahmedabad
description: Presenting a lucrative opportunity for discerning home buyers seeking a fully furnished home in the city. This magnificent 2 BHK flat is situated in the vibrant locale opposite Ayojan Nagar Vinzol, Ahmedabad and promises a seamless fusion of modern comforts and urban convenience. Property specificationsMeticulously planned and thoughtfully designed for urban comforts, this flat spanning a super built-up area of 847 sqft, is situated on the 3rd floor of a well-maintained 5-storey building. This flat is not just a dwelling its an epitome of elegance and comfort, boasting a ready-to-move status with complete furnishings for immediate occupancy. The interiors are further complimented by exquisite marble flooring, adding a touch of opulence and sophistication to every corner. Embracing the principles of vaastu, the flat is graciously east-facing, ensuring harmony and positive energy flow throughout. With two bedrooms and two bathrooms, of which one is Indian style and one is western fashioned, convenience is seamlessly integrated into every detail. Also, one of these bathrooms is attached to a bedroom while the other is common. A geyser is installed in one of the bathrooms, catering to your comfort needs effortlessly. Further enhancing the charm are the two balconies, offering views of the bustling main road, extending the space of your living space. The living room bathes in natural light, creating a welcoming ambiance for relaxation and entertainment alike. A modern modular kitchen, equipped with a piped gas connection and an attached utility area, makes everyday cooking a delightful affair.FacilitiesExperience utmost convenience with open parking space ensuring hassle-free vehicle accommodation, and 24-hour water supply guaranteeing uninterrupted comfort. Rest assured that a 100 power backup facility, dedicated security guard, and CCTV surveillance are in place to safeguard your peace of mind. The lift in the building ensures effortless access to your flat on the 3rd floor.LocalityNestled within a vibrant neighborhood, this residence offers proximity to esteemed educational institutions and healthcare facilities within a mere 1km radius. In the same radius, you can find several shopping malls and supermarkets, while banks and ATMs are close by for any financial needs. Commuting is hassle-free with readily available public transport options. For those traveling to different cities, Maninagar railway station stands a mere 10km away, while the metro station is conveniently situated 6km from your doorstep, offering unparalleled accessibility to the citys pulse.Read more

Title: 2 BHK Apartment for Sale in Yash Flora, Nikol Ahmedabad
description: Discover the epitome of modern living in the heart of Nikol, Ahmedabad, as we present an exquisite opportunity to own a meticulously designed and thoughtfully crafted 2 BHK flat for sale in the prestigious Yash Flora residence, where every corner whispers comfort, elegance, and a vibrant lifestyle waiting to unfold within the confines of its walls.Property SpecificationsImmerse yourself in the epitome of luxury and comfort with this meticulously designed 2 BHK flat, boasting a super built-up area of 1179 sqft. This East-facing abode, nestled on the 6th floor of a 7-floor building, exudes positive vibes and adheres to Vaastu principles, ensuring harmony and prosperity in your living space. Step into a fully furnished haven where every detail has been carefully curated to provide a seamless living experience. The flat features two bedrooms, with one attached bathroom and another common bathroom, both equipped with Western fixtures and geysers for your convenience. Additionally, revel in the luxury of a private balcony attached to the hall, offering serene views of the garden. The thoughtful floor plan includes a separate living and dining area, creating distinct spaces for relaxation and entertainment. The flat also comes with extra storage space in the form of a 350-litre capacity complex storage unit, allowing you to declutter and organise your belongings effortlessly. The heart of this home is its modern modular kitchen, complete with a chimney for efficient ventilation. The kitchen has a piped gas connection, ensuring a hassle-free cooking experience. A utility area attached to the kitchen adds to the functionality of the space. The flooring of the entire flat is adorned with vitrified tiles, adding a touch of sophistication and easy maintenance. FacilitiesExplore comfort and security in this flat offering efficient bike parking. Enjoy a reliable water supply from borewells and corporation sources. Safety is ensured with a dedicated guard and CCTV surveillance. The building features two lifts for easy access. Amenities include rainwater harvesting, a gym, a clubhouse, and a park, with conveniences like reserved parking, intercom, and visitor parking. Maintenance staff, waste disposal, and laundry services add to the ease. Indulge in indoor games, jogging tracks, and flower gardens. Additional features include DTH, RO water, banquet hall, conference room, and retail boulevard. Safety is a priority with fire-fighting equipment. LocalityThis flat is conveniently situated near Shalby Hospital and the BRTS Bus Stop, ensuring easy access to essential services. Schools are within a 500 m radius, making it convenient for families with children. The vibrant retail experience of Dmart is 1 km away for your shopping needs. Banks and ATMs are readily available, and public transport is easily accessible. The railway station is a mere 2 km away. Read more

LocalityThe property is conveniently situated near Shreenath Residency and Satva 2 Residency, making it easy to navigate and locate. Public transportation is easily accessible, with buses and autos readily available in the area. Title: 2 BHK Apartment for Sale in New Ranip Ahmedabad
description: Nestled in the thriving locality of New Ranip, Ahmedabad, a delightful 2 BHK flat awaits discerning buyers in the esteemed Ashray Platina. Offering a perfect blend of modern comfort and aesthetic appeal, this stunning property is an ideal investment opportunity for modern home buyers.Property specificationsSpread across a carpet area of 635 sqft, this flat is situated on the 1st floor of a 5-storey building. The flat comes furnished with exquisite woodwork, and the flooring is adorned with elegant vitrified tiles. It faces the North-East direction, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation throughout the day.The flat comprises 2 spacious bedrooms, perfect for accommodating a small family. Additionally, there are 2 well-appointed bathrooms, with one attached to the master bedroom and the other serving as a common facility. One of the bathrooms is designed in the Indian style, while the other is equipped with modern western fittings. Furthermore, one of the bathrooms also features a geyser, providing hot water convenience.The highlight of this property is the 3 road-facing balconies, offering breathtaking views and a serene ambiance. One balcony is attached to the hall, one to the bedroom, and another to the utility kitchen. These balconies provide the perfect space to unwind and enjoy the fresh air.The flat also features a spacious living cum dining area, providing a perfect space for entertaining guests. A store room is available in the kitchen, ensuring ample storage space for all your culinary needs. The modular kitchen is a chefs delight, equipped with modern fixtures and a piped gas connection. Additionally, a utility area is available, allowing you to efficiently manage household chores.FacilitiesThis property comes with an open parking space, ensuring convenient parking for residents and visitors alike. The flat also benefits from 24-hour water supply, ensuring a continuous flow of water. Furthermore, a 100 power backup facility is provided, ensuring uninterrupted power supply. The building is guarded by a security guard, and CCTV cameras are installed to ensure the safety and security of the residents. There is also an elevator in the building, providing easy access to all floors.LocalityThe flat is conveniently located near the iconic BAPS Temple, serving as a prominent landmark. Within a radius of 2 to 5 km, you will find reputed schools, hospitals, malls, and supermarkets, ensuring all your daily needs are easily accessible. Banks and ATMs are also in close proximity, providing convenience in managing your finances.Public transportation is easily available, with buses and autos readily accessible. Additionally, there are two railway stations located just 4 km and 8 km away respectively. The metro station is also within a 4 to 5 km radius, making commuting a breeze.Read more

description: Discover your dream home in the heart of Ahmedabad. This 2 BHK flat for sale on New CG Road offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience for modern living.::::::Property Specifications::::::This splendid 2 BHK flat, with a generous super area of 115 sq yards, is the epitome of comfortable living. Situated on the 5th and top floor of the building, this semi-furnished apartment offers a perfect blend of convenience and elegance.::::::The flat features two bedrooms, with wardrobes in the master bedroom, and two well-maintained bathrooms. Both bathrooms have geysers and Western-style fittings. Enjoy the serene garden view from the balcony attached to the spacious living cum dining room. The interiors are thoughtfully designed with lights and fans in all rooms, enhancing the overall ambiance.::::::The kitchen is a modern delight, equipped with modular cabinets and a piped gas connection. The flooring is adorned with elegant vitrified tiles, and the property is vastu compliant, ensuring harmonious living. The flat faces East-West, ensuring excellent ventilation and natural light throughout the day.::::::Facilities ::::::As for facilities, there is open parking available, along with 24-hour water supply, 100% power backup, CCTV surveillance, and multiple lifts in the building.::::::Locality ::::::This property is strategically located within 500 meters of Podar School, making it an ideal choice for families. It also offers easy access to colleges and bus stops. Hospitals such as SMS and KD are within 2 to 4 km, and the airport is just 7 km away. Public transport is readily accessible, with the main ring road being only 2.5 km away.:::::: You'll find all major banks and ATMs close by, as well as supermarkets within walking distance. The railway station and shopping malls are also within walking distance, while the Sarbarmati metro station is just 2 km away, enhancing your connectivity options.Read more

description: Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience with our exquisite 2 BHK flat for sale in Vastral, Ahmedabad. This thoughtfully designed residence offers a spacious living experience with modern amenities. Located in a prime area, it ensures easy access to essential facilities and excellent connectivity. Dont miss this opportunity to own your dream home in one of Ahmedabads thriving neighborhoods.Property Specifications Spanning a generous carpet area of 934 sqft, this fully furnished property is situated on the 3rd floor of a meticulously crafted 5-story building. The property is vaastu compliant, ensuring a harmonious living environment, and it faces the North-West direction.The spacious living cum dining area welcomes you with a sense of warmth, providing the perfect setting for family gatherings and entertaining guests. The modular kitchen, equipped with modern amenities and a convenient piped gas connection, adds a touch of luxury to daily culinary experiences.Featuring two well-appointed bedrooms, this flat ensures a peaceful retreat for its residents. The master bedroom boasts an attached bathroom, while a common bathroom caters to the needs of guests. Both bathrooms are elegantly designed in a Western style and come equipped with geysers for your convenience.Step outside onto the attached balconies, offering enchanting views of the surrounding garden or the bustling road. These outdoor spaces provide a perfect spot to unwind, sip your morning coffee, or simply bask in the serenity of your home.  With vitrified tile flooring throughout, the flat exudes a contemporary charm. FacilitiesThe property comes with open parking, ensuring a secure space for your vehicle. Enjoy the convenience of 24-hour water supply, 100 power backup, and the added layer of security provided by a dedicated guard and CCTV installations. A well-maintained lift ensures easy access to your residence.LocalityStrategically located near Nirant Chokdi, Vastral, this flat provides easy access to essential amenities. Within a 1 km radius, discover reputed schools, healthcare facilities, shopping malls, supermarkets, and reliable public transport options, including buses and autos.Benefit from proximity to banks and ATMs for financial transactions. The railway station is conveniently located just 10 km away, while the metro station is within 1 km, ensuring excellent connectivity.Read more

Title: 3 BHK Apartment for Sale in Amogha by Adani Realty, Vaishnodevi Circle Ahmedabad
description: Step into the epitome of luxurious living with this exquisite 3 BHK Flat for sale in Amogha by Adani Realty, nestled in the prestigious locale of Vaishnodevi Circle, Ahmedabad. Imbued with the principles of vaastu, this meticulously designed residence welcomes you to a harmonious lifestyle, perfectly oriented to embrace the energizing aura of the East. Explore the perfect blend of elegance and comfort in this sought-after property, crafted by Adani Realty for those who appreciate the finer things in life.::Note- This property is under construction, with possession expected by the end of March.::::::Property Specifications ::::::Boasting a carpet area of 826 sqft, located on the 7th floor of a contemporary building. This unfurnished gem offers a perfect canvas for personalizing your dream home. The apartment welcomes you with three generously sized bedrooms, two of which are attached to ensuite bathrooms, and a common bathroom, all featuring modern Western-style fittings and equipped with geysers for added comfort. Two balconies grace the apartment, one attached to the hall and the other one is the kitchen, overlooking the bustling main road, providing a perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the view.::::::The thoughtful layout includes a separate living and dining area, offering distinct spaces for relaxation and entertainment. The regular kitchen is equipped with a platform and sink, with the convenience of a piped gas connection. A utility area attached to the kitchen adds to the functionality of the space. The entire apartment is adorned with vitrified flooring, adding a touch of sophistication to every corner.::::::Facilities ::::::In terms of facilities, the apartment provides open parking for convenience. Water supply is assured with both borewell and corporation sources, and a 100% power backup facility ensures uninterrupted living. Security is a priority, with the presence of a security guard, CCTV installations, and two lifts for easy access to the 7th floor.::::::Locality ::::::Located in a prime locality near Shopper Plaza, Theatre, and a Luxury Mall Showroom, every room offers captivating views. Within a 1 km radius, you'll find reputable schools, hospitals, malls and supermarkets, ensuring that all your daily needs are met with utmost convenience. Banks and ATMs are readily accessible, and public transportation, including a railway station 15 km away and a metro station 3 km away, provides excellent connectivity to the city.::Read more

Title: 2 BHK Apartment for Sale in Gota Ahmedabad
description: An attractive 2 BHK flat is available for sale in Aryan Pride, Gota, Ahmedabad, offering a spacious super area of 1215 sqft on the 4th floor of a 5-floor building.::::::Property specifications::::::The residence is thoughtfully furnished with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, separate living & dining area, one balcony and a modular kitchen. Within a 50-meter radius, residents can find reputable schools, hospitals, and well-equipped malls and supermarkets, making daily life remarkably convenient. Banks and ATMs in close proximity add to the financial convenience.::::::Public transport facilities, including bus stops, are conveniently located within 50 meters, ensuring easy connectivity to the rest of Kolkata. Title: 3 BHK Apartment for Sale in Shela Ahmedabad
description: Home buyers, here is an amazing opportunity to become the proud owner of this meticulously designed 3 BHK apartment in Ahmedabad. This property is available for sale in Maher Homes 2, Shela and is absolutely ready to move in. Come have a look at this property today and make it yours before others do.Property SpecificationsPositioned on the 1st floor, this 3 BHK apartment is skillfully designed with respect to the vaastu guidelines and the main entrance faces the north direction. The flat is crafted in a way to receive sufficient natural light and ventilation thus residents can experience pleasant ambience all day.Moving to the layout, the flat consists of two furnished bedrooms, each adorned with double beds and cupboards from Godrej Interio. The third bedroom seamlessly combines with the living room, offering flexibility in usage. Further, there are three western-style bathrooms among which one is attached to the master bedroom, a second attached to the kids room, and third is a common bathroomall equipped with showers and piping for geysers.To continue, the flat has a modular kitchen with cabinets below the platform and a stainless steel sink, complemented by a piped gas connection from Adani Gas. A convenient balcony attached to the kitchen serves as a wash area. Throughout the apartment, vitrified tiles enhance the aesthetic appeal. Electrical fittings include LED tube lights and fans in all rooms.FacilitiesThis property is well-supported by power supply by UGVCL and a power generator is also available as a backup for lifts. The society offers a range of amenities, including a clubhouse, common lawn, security at the gates and basement, and ground parking. Two parking slots are designated in the basement exclusively for the flat. Security is paramount, with CCTV cameras installed in the society. LocalityThis property boasts proximity to essential conveniences including renowned schools like DPS Bopal and Shanti Asiatic School. South Bopal market, and hospitals like Shalby Multi-Speciality Hospital, Advait Multi-Speciality Hospital, and Irva Orthopaedic Hospital are close to this property. For ease of commuting, the nearest Metro station is Thaltej, approximately 10 kms away, and BRTS is available from Bopal.Read more

With an uninterrupted power supply from UGVCL and Geb len, residents can enjoy peace of mind during power outages. Plus, with a low maintenance expense of just Rs 2000 per month, living here is both convenient and cost-effective.LocalitySituated in a prime location, the property offers excellent connectivity to key areas such as Sindhu Bhavan Road, Thaltej, Ghuma, and Sanand. So; don’t let go of this chance.::::::Property Specifications::::::Positioned on the last floor of a 5-storey building; this stunning 3BHK apartment is built across a super area of 2000sqft. Benefitted with freehold ownership rights; this property assures the prospective buyer of making a worthwhile investment of their valuable money and time. ::::::Thoughtfully crafted; this apartment is complete with 3 air-conditioned bedrooms adorned with trendy wardrobes, beds, dressing units and TV units. There are 3 western fashioned bathrooms of which 2 are attached to the bedrooms and the remaining is commonly accessible. Also; geysers are installed in all the bathrooms for instant availability of hot water.::::::Perfect for a family get together; the generously sized living cum dining area of this flat is well-appointed with a classy sofa set and an AC. Impressively designed is the kitchen of this abode and is facilitated with roomy storage cabinets, chimney, hob, RO system, a platform and a sink.::::::Furthermore; the flat features 2 wide balconies overlooking the main road of which one is linked with the hall and the other balcony is connected to the kitchen. There is also a puja room where you can worship your favourite deity.::::::Enhancing the charm of this residence is the vitrified tile flooring flawlessly done across all the rooms.::::::Facilities::::::One covered parking slot, 24hours water supply, security along with CCTV surveillance and a lift are some of the basic yet prime facilities provided here. ::::::Locality::::::Situated just 100m away from CG Road, this society is opposite Samarpan Flats. Key social amenities such as schools, hospitals can be reached in 5-7mins drive and Reliance Fresh Store is 8mins walking distance away. Your monetary needs can be met easily as the property is near the main branch of IDBI and Kotak Mahindra banks.::::::Conveyance will be completely effortless for the residents as buses, autos are easily available within the vicinity and the railway station is 3-4km away.Read more

description: Step into the epitome of luxurious living with this exquisite 3 BHK Flat for sale in Amogha by Adani Realty, nestled in the prestigious locale of Vaishnodevi Circle, Ahmedabad. Imbued with the principles of vaastu, this meticulously designed residence welcomes you to a harmonious lifestyle, perfectly oriented to embrace the energizing aura of the East. The regular kitchen is equipped with a platform and sink, with the convenience of a piped gas connection. A utility area attached to the kitchen adds to the functionality of the space. The entire apartment is adorned with vitrified flooring, adding a touch of sophistication to every corner.::::::Facilities ::::::In terms of facilities, the apartment provides open parking for convenience. Water supply is assured with both borewell and corporation sources, and a 100% power backup facility ensures uninterrupted living. Within a 1 km radius, you'll find reputable schools, hospitals, malls and supermarkets, ensuring that all your daily needs are met with utmost convenience. Banks and ATMs are readily accessible, and public transportation, including a railway station 15 km away and a metro station 3 km away, provides excellent connectivity to the city.::Read more

Two elevators within the building provide effortless access to different floors.::::::But what truly sets this property apart are the recreational facilities. You can take a dip in the swimming pool, maintain your fitness routine in the gymnasium, enjoy a movie night in the mini cinema theatre, engage in indoor games, or let your children play in the designated play area. description: Don't miss your chance to own this unique and stunning 3 BHK flat which is for sale in Shahibaug, Ahmedabad. This beautifully designed flat comes with prime facilities and is located in a prime area with easy access to transportation and daily necessities. ::::::Property Specifications:: ::::Step into your own personal oasis with this stunning 3 BHK flat in Shahibaug, Ahmedabad. This spacious flat is a luxurious retreat from the hustle and bustle of the city, boasting a carpet area of 1200 sqft and located on the 2nd floor of a 4-floor building. ::::::Inside, the flat has been fully furnished to provide the ultimate in comfort and convenience. It includes 3 ACs, all kitchen accessories, a dining table, a 12-seater sofa, 2 TVs, a washing machine, an oven, electric geysers, and gas geysers.::::::With 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, this flat offers ample room for families or those who enjoy a little extra space. The attached bathroom is perfect for added privacy and convenience, while the common bathroom is ideal for guests. Both bathrooms are western-style and have geysers, ensuring you have access to hot water whenever you need it. ::::::The 2 garden-facing balconies are the highlight of this flat, providing breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape and allowing plenty of natural light to filter in. One balcony is attached to the bedroom and the other balcony is attached to the kitchen. ::::::The separate living and dining area in this flat provides ample space for relaxation and entertaining guests. The store room is an added bonus, providing plenty of extra space to store your belongings. The modular kitchen is fully equipped with a chimney and a piped gas connection, making cooking a breeze. The utility area attached to the kitchen is also a great space for laundry and other household chores.::::::::::::The marble flooring throughout the flat not only adds to its luxurious feel but also makes it easy to maintain and clean. The flat is also vaastu compliant and being west facing, the flat receives ample natural light, keeping it bright and airy throughout the day.::::::Facilities ::::::The flat offers both covered and open parking options to ensure the safety and security of your vehicles. Water supply is available from both a Borewell and the corporation and there is a 100% power backup facility. For your security, there is a dedicated security guard and CCTVs installed on the premises. A lift is also available, making it easy and convenient to access your flat.::::::::::::::Locality ::::::Located near the Sabarmati Riverfront, the flat is surrounded by some of the best amenities Ahmedabad has to offer. There are schools and hospitals within a 1 km radius, ensuring easy access to quality education and healthcare. Malls and supermarkets are also located within 1 km and so are the banks and ATMs. The flat is also well-connected to public transportation, with a railway station located 3 km away, a metro station just 2 km away, and the airport located 3 km away.::::Read more

Title: 5 BHK Penthouse for Sale in Hebatpur Ahmedabad
description: Experience the epitome of luxury living with this magnificent 5 BHK residence now available for sale in the prestigious neighborhood of Thaltej, Ahmedabad. Boasting a sprawling super built-up area of 6995 square feet and complete furniture available, this opulent property offers unparalleled comfort, elegance, and sophistication.Property SpecificationsThis vaastu-compliant masterpiece, facing the serene South, offers unparalleled comfort and elegance across two expansive floors, encompassing the 11th and 12th floors of the building. With a carpet area of 1500 square feet, the terrace provides a serene retreat to soak in panoramic views and enjoy leisurely moments.As you step into the 11th floor, youre greeted by four lavishly appointed bedrooms, each offering a haven of tranquility. Six meticulously designed bathrooms, including five attached and one common, feature modern Western fixtures and geysers, ensuring ultimate comfort and convenience for residents. A balcony off the bedrooms offers a charming space to bask in the natural beauty of the surroundings. The modular kitchen, complete with a chimney and piped gas connection, beckons culinary enthusiasts to create gourmet delights, while the utility area attached to the kitchen adds to the functionality of the space. The flooring throughout exudes opulence with pristine marble, enhancing the ambience of every room.Ascending to the 12th floor, youll find a spacious bedroom with two bathrooms, both featuring Western amenities and geysers. A balcony extends from the bedroom, offering breathtaking views of the surroundings, while the rest of the floor opens up to a vast terrace, ideal for hosting gatherings or simply enjoying alfresco living at its finest.Facilities Residents of this prestigious abode enjoy access to three covered parking spaces, ensuring convenience and security for their vehicles. With reliable water supply from both borewell and corporation sources, along with 100 power backup, uninterrupted living is guaranteed. Additionally, the building boasts top-notch security measures, ensuring peace of mind for residents.Locality Conveniently located near Palladium Mall, this residence offers easy access to essential amenities such as schools, hospitals, malls, and supermarkets, all within a convenient 1-km radius. Banks and ATMs are also readily accessible, catering to your financial needs with ease. Excellent public transportation options, including the railway station and metro station, are just 1 km away, ensuring seamless connectivity to other parts of the city.Read more
